title: Hunter S. Thompson, Hell's Angels: A Strange and Terrible Saga
src: The Angels don’t like to be called losers, but they have learned to live with it. “Yeah, I guess I am,” said one. “But you’re looking at one loser who’s going to make a hell of a scene on the way out.
